title: What are benefits of rock collecting? - Quora

response.answer_text: What benefits of rock collecting? Hmmm… I’ve been collecting rocks for years now. There are many benefits as I look at it. First, excercise. That’s a huge benefit. Secondly, my back is really messed up and it used to be so bad that there were days I couldn’t move. However, if I didn’t move it would get worse and yet it hurt so badly to move. Catch 22. Anyhow, on those days I would literally force myself to get up and go rock hunting. It was pleasing to me and gave me the incintive to push through the pain. I’d take along a backpack and fill it up. Eventually, my back became stronger and because it did the pain is virtually gone now. Big benefit for me! Which brings me to number three. I’d bring home those rocks and didn’t know what to do with them, so I began doing some landscaping with them. My yard looked awesome, myback felt better and ultimately my piece of mind was restored as well. There are so many benefits to rock collecting , far more than is easily seen. If you have an idea to start, I’d definitely say go for it. I doubt you’ll regret it.

Your personal satisfaction. you may even be able to turn a profit, depending on what rocks and locations you are collecting in. Some rocks like agates are prized by collectors. The main reason/benefit for rock collecting makes you feel good. All that walking will be good for you.
